metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0137 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in Platform Apps in Google Chrome on Chrome OS priorto 109.0.5414.74 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
